data.description: Result to be released privately via the Gaussian mechanism.

candidates.description: Set from which the Exponential mechanism will return an element.

name: exponential_mechanism

aggregator.description: component describing the type of aggregation to perform

privacy_usage.description: Object describing the type and amount of privacy to be used for the mechanism release.

utility.description: Ignore this argument in userland. Utility function that is internally overridden.

return.description: Element from the candidate set selected via the Exponential mechanism.

description: Returns an element from a finite set with probability relative to its utility.
